Â© The Trustees of the British Museum

In the work shown from the Marshall Islands, wooden sticks and shells were arranged in geometric patterns to

choices.label: reflect the changing seasons through the interweaving of different materials
document interconnected trade routes within the larger Pacific region
reference remembered locations of islands and the direction of ocean currents
represent the interconnected family lineages between the inhabitants of different islands

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
